Situated beside the north south highway, nearby to the entrace of Penang Bridge.

Bus connecting to Bukit Mertajam and Butterworth
From Butterworth to Seberang Jaya RapidPenang Bus 703 [RM2.40]
From Seberang Jaya to Pacific Megamall / Chai Leng Park [RM1.40]
From Seberang Jaya to Bukit Mertajam, you need to take Bus No. 703 
to Pacific Megamall and from there, you must take Bus No. 701 to go to Bukit Mertajam-Summit. [RM1.40]

value: Expo Pertanian Pulau Pinang - the annual Penang expo on agriculture

), Bandar Seberang Jaya. - A small bird park located on the mainland (Seberang Perai) about 10 min from the Penang Bridge. Take a walk under nice shady trees and view dozens of kinds of birds including ostriches, sea eagles, peafowls, hornbills, flamingos, macaws, and grey parrots. There are also two walk-through aviaries and a fish pond. Some of the enclosures do need a touch of paint, but kids should love this place. Open
Pacific Megamall - the biggest shopping mall in the district, 2nd is the JUSCO Bandar Perda located in Bukit Mertajam

Sunway Carnival - Sunway Carnival is a stylish 4-storey shopping mall strategically located within the town center of Seberang Jaya. Parkson Departmental Store and Giant Hypermarket are both the anchor tenants. With a total of 161 specialty outlets ranging from international to regional retailers, shoppers will find a variety selection in of fashion, accessories, shoes, jewellery, timepieces, music, videos, gifts, souvenirs, leathers, books, pharmacies, electrical products, home d√©cor, cineplex, restaurant, cafes and even an amusement centre.
Public Library, KWSP/PERKESO/TNB/FMM Building are just opposite the Sunway Hotel
